meanings.sent1: The admins at school help students with their questions.
meanings.sent2: The admins manage the website and keep it running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The admins had a meeting to discuss new ways to improve the school.
meanings.sent4: The admins are like the captains of a ship, guiding everyone in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The admins are the backbone of the organization, ensuring everything operates efficiently.

meanings.sent1: The admins in the office handle all the paperwork.
meanings.sent2: The admins make sure all the tasks are assigned and completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The admins decided to have a pizza party to boost morale.
meanings.sent4: The admins are like the conductors of an orchestra, coordinating all the different parts.
meanings.sent5: The admins are essential for keeping everything organized and on track.

meanings.sent1: The admins of the medication must be done carefully.
meanings.sent2: The admins of justice must be fair and impartial.
meanings.sent3: The admins of the test were nervous about making sure everything was set up correctly.
meanings.sent4: The admins of a company are like the gears in a clock, keeping everything moving smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The admins of a project are crucial for its success, ensuring all tasks are completed on time.
